title: ElevAIte
description: ElevAIte is a full-stack productivity app powered by a RAG based AI assistant that allows students to interact with a personal assistant to view and create classes, check bank balances, track expenses, and monitor internship statuses, all from a unified web management platform.

title: House Prediction Model
description: Introduction to a machine learning project built to reinforce my skills in regression models like Linear Regression and Random Forest. Focused on data preprocessing, feature engineering, model tuning, and deploying a trained .pkl model integrated with a React frontend

title: StyleScan
description: StyleScan is a deep learning-based clothing analysis tool that classifies apparel images into 15 unique fashion categories using a convolutional neural network and Grad-CAM visualizations.  Built with PyTorch and OpenCV, this project helps explore how AI models “see” fashion and interpret image  features.

title: TaskMasterAI
description: Collaborated with a team of 5 fellow programmers as part of the AI Society's Mentorship Program to develop an AI-powered student workflow system that generates semester-long study plans based on course materials, recommends personalized learning resources, and creates dynamic quizzes to assess knowledge retention

title: Arkos (HackAI 2025)
description: A web app that uses an AI powered RAG model to process financial reports and lets users quickly look up details like annual revenue and profit margins

title: Bank Siumulator
description: Full stack app that uses mongodb and react for route management, interactive user iterface, and jwt for authentication/authorization

title: Insurance Prediction (FinHack 2025)
description: Insurance Prediction Model that uses linear regression to predict the health insurance price of a person in a given area. Created for the 2025 Finhack competition

title: SignLangAI (HackUTD 2024)
description: An AI powered sign language recognizer using the users webcam and tensorflow.js to analyze the image and identify the hand sign
